question: Which company has partnered with National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) to provide access to digital skilling tools, to its training partners?
explanation:
A strategic unit of Tata Consultancy Services, TCS iON, has partnered with the National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) to provide its training partners access to digital skilling tools.
The access to digital skilling tools is provided using TCS iON Digital Glass Room facility. This partnership aims to strengthen the online content aggregation platform of NSDC, eSkill India. 
TCS iON Digital Glass Room is a web-based digital education platform which enables educators to upload their own lessons.
